activities: In connection with providing services to our customers, Piano Software Inc. may access personal information about its clients customers in the EU and Switzerland. Our clients act as the data controller for any such consumer data collected in the EU and Switzerland and subsequently transferred to Piano Software in the United States. Piano Software acts as a data processor on behalf of its customers with respect to such consumer data and accordingly carries out the instructions of such customers with regard to the collection, processing, and protection of such consumer data. We also may transfer HR data from our affiliates located in the EU.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Consumer data may include: email address, basic information, IP location, credit card information, mailing address.  HR data may include employee name, tax ID#, mailing address, phone number, birth date, and other information typically collected in the employment context.
recoursemech: JAMS for consumer data.  EU DPAs for organizational HR data.
